events.title: Community Garden Meetup
events.description: Join us for our weekly community garden meetup. We'll be planting winter vegetables and discussing plans for the spring season. All skill levels welcome!

events.title: Open Mic Night at Berlin Cafe
events.description: Monthly open mic night featuring local musicians, poets, and performers. Sign up starts at 7 PM, performances begin at 8 PM. Free entry, donations appreciated.

events.title: Neighborhood Book Club
events.description: This month we're discussing 'The Midnight Library' by Matt Haig. Coffee and snacks provided. New members always welcome!

events.title: Morning Yoga in the Park
events.description: Start your day with a free outdoor yoga session suitable for all levels. Bring your own mat and water. Weather permitting.

events.title: Tech Skills Workshop: Web Development Basics
events.description: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics in this beginner-friendly workshop. Laptops will be provided if you don't have one. Limited spots available.
